amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the State of Arkansas to pay the Federal Government the fair market value of the property at the time ownership of the hatchery is transferred.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the State of Arkansas to pay full market value upon transfer of ownership of the Corning National Fish Hatchery from the Federal Government to the State of Arkansas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 315 (Roll no. 356).
